CustomField.description: Used by the scheduled flow to set the contract to active.
CustomField.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Professional Services")), Contract_IsActive__c = FALSE, Startdate_contract__c <= Today(), End_date_contract__c > TODAY())
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used by the scheduled flow to set the contract to active.
CustomField.label: Flow: Is Active True
